product_name: La Roche-PosayToleriane Hydrating Gentle Face Cleanser for Dry Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganRefillableLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Cleanser is a face cleanser for dry skin that removes impurities and makeup while reinforcing the skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsOil-free face cleanser removes excess oil, impurities and makeup without irritating sensitive skinGentle cleanser formula for dry skin restores comfort and helps retain moistureMilky-cream face cleanser texture leaves dry skin feeling fresh and comfortable with no pore-clogging residueMaintains the skin barrierHydrates the skinNon-comedogenicDermatologist and allergy tested on sensitive skinKey IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesCeramide-3 is a natural component of the skin barrierNiacinamide is form of vitamin B3 with soothing propertiesGlycerin moisturizes and hydrates the skinFormulated WithoutOilFragranceSoapSulfateParabenItem 2503387How To UseWet skin with lukewarm water. Pump cleanser into hands and work into lather. Massage into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry without rubbing. Cleanse morning and/or evening.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau (La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water), Glycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Propylene Glycol, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Polysorbate 60, Ceramide Np, Niacinamide, Sodium Chloride, Coco-Betaine, Disodium Edta, Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, T-Butyl Alcohol, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Wet skin with lukewarm water. Pump cleanser into hands and work into lather. Massage into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry without rubbing. Cleanse morning and/or evening.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes.
ingredients: Aqua / Water / Eau (La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water)

reviews.headline: Not impressed
reviews.comments: I love this brand yet first time purchase for this particular product. I have sensitive skin which made me think this would be good for me, but my face doesn't feel clean and feels like a light film left on my face.

reviews.headline: This will be my go to from now on
reviews.comments: I'm loving how my skin feels and looks since I started using this. It does a good job removing makeup too. I'm on a mission to decrease the amount of toxins I put on my body, and this product rated excellent. It's a keeper

reviews.headline: Tried and true favorite
reviews.comments: I've tried countless cleansers, and this is the only one that I continue to re-purchase. It's so gentle on my skin, which can get really dry in the cold months and does not irritate my psoriasis.

reviews.headline: Old Faithful
reviews.comments: I have combination skin and love this product, this is the only cleanser I have used for the past few years and have never had any issues. When I first started using this product I was having a few breakouts but when I used a their other product for acne prone skin it was too harsh for my sensitive skin in some areas. So I tried using both products at the same time. I would us the medicated cleanser on the areas needed and the gentle cleanser everywhere else and it worked like a charm! Now I just use the hydrating cleanser as my skin has cleared up. LOVE this product.

reviews.headline: Love this Product
reviews.comments: My family and friends notice the difference in my skincare routine with this product. I will definitely and recommend this to everyone. I like how it feels and much confidence in my skin now.

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: I have been using this for years.  I feel like it cleans my skin without irritating it at all.  I will continue to use as it is also extremely affordable.

reviews.headline: This is my favorite cleanser
reviews.comments: It's so creamy, and feels so luxurious. It doesn't dry out my skin. My favorite cleanser by far.

reviews.headline: i would never by again
reviews.comments: I bought this product in hopes Of fixing some cystic acne I had been dealing with because of some hormonal changes. at first, when using this product my skin did feel softer. But with each use my skin texture went from being smooth with the occasional bump to having small bumps all over my face. i ended up developing acne in places I had never had it to begin with, like my chin And forehead, and it worsened the texture on my cheeks. i probably won't be using this line of product ever again as when i stopped using it my skin instantly became more clear.

reviews.headline: Burns - especially under eye
reviews.comments: I *don't* have sensitive skin and have never had a reaction to the many product I've tried. But this made my skin so hot, particularly the under eye/upper cheek area. I luckily haven't noticed any actual effect on my skin (aside from red for a bit following washing) and am discontinuing after about 3 washes.

reviews.headline: Burning sensation - and I don't have sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Tried it several times, but instantly gives burning sensation. Day after use, my skin is dry and peeling. Tried using it less often, but still the same issues. I don't have sensitive skin and never have had any issues with any skin care product.

reviews.headline: Will buy this forever
reviews.comments: I love this brand. It's gentle, so it's safe for sensitive skin. Cleans my face perfectly in the hot sweaty summer.

reviews.headline: ü©µü©µü©µü©µü©µ MY FAVE ü©µü©µü©µü©µü©µ
reviews.comments: I have been using this since the first day it was introduced into the LP line and my face LOVES this cleanser.  This is a creamy cleanser that does not foam but it leaves your face feeling so good after washing it.  I have extremely sensitive, oily, mature skin and this cleanser is has been the best part of my skincare routine. I always follow-up with LP Hyaluronic B5 serum, along with my retinol and my face has never looked and felt better. ü©µ

reviews.headline: Hydrating, while still feeling refreshed
reviews.comments: Started using this after struggling to find a good cleanser that wouldn't leave my skin dry. This is the second time I have purchased. Massive bonus points for having a refillable version of it.

reviews.headline: Use this every am and pm!
reviews.comments: Love this brand!

reviews.headline: Great Face Wash!
reviews.comments: I have acne prone skin with rosacea. I've been using this face wash for the past year & it has cleared up my skin. I don't break out in acne, and my roscea never flares up. I had issues with this brand's acne specific face wash causing acne & rosacea flare ups, but this one is gentle enough and cleans well.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product forever
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product! It works so well for me.

reviews.headline: creamy velvety texture
reviews.comments: This is my first time trying this brands cleanser and I love it. It is like a lotion type consistency a little bit goes a long way and it melts into your skin. I love how hydrated my skin looks and feels after using it.

reviews.headline: I really wish more companies did this
reviews.comments: In a day and time when everyone is concerned about waste I think this is amazing. Not only is it saving room in the land fill but it's also saving me a few dollars. Thank you so much for actually doing something other than taking about far off ideas. This applies to me on a daily basis as I hate to haul off a lot of trash from my country home. Also‚Ä¶ great product!

reviews.headline: Does the job!
reviews.comments:
I went to chat GPT in search of a new second cleanse because my old one was dangerously low, and not doing anything for me (i used the vanicream one), and based on my dry, reaction prone skin type, this was the one recommended.

First of all, huge bottle!! Im sure that a bottle like this will last me over a year, since i only use one pump per use. Its also nice and hydrating as marketed, not leaving my skin feel tight and stripped, where i have to stretch my face to get rid of that feeling. Its very nice and gentle as well!

Some things i didnt expect or really care for was the lack of foaming, which at first made me question if it worked or not, and the slight warmth it brought around my nose and upper lip. Though, no reaction happened, which works for me!

Overall, its good! Trust me, even though it doesnt foam, it works, and it does the job.

reviews.headline: So gentle, so good
reviews.comments: This is my go-to cleanser for dry, sensitive skin. It's super gentle, doesn't strip, and leaves my skin feeling soft and calm. Love that there's a refill option too‚Äîeco-friendly and lasts forever!

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought this cleanser in my local Ulta after seeing it there several times and waiting to see how others were reviewing and getting along with it. I was very impressed with the ingredients; it is difficult to find a gentle milk cleanser that is truly acne safe! Or really any cleanser for that matter. I have just finished a protocol with Roccoco Botanicals to heal my skin barrier and was looking for something to maintain my clear skin and continue to cleanse effectively without stripping the barrier I had just built back up. The value for money here is incredible, I thought at first it was just too good! I decided to buy it and I am so grateful I did. I do not use any foaming cleansers because I have inflammatory acne prone skin post childbirth. My skin is rather normal with oil control and can tend to be on the dry side at times. This cleanser isn't the most hydrating, but it rinses off like a gel and leaves no residue on my skin. It is a white milky-gel with about a medium viscosity. It is just right really and spreads on the skin really well, damp or dry. I wouldn't recommend for makeup removal, this is a skin cleanser not a remover! I use Bioderma Sensibo H2O to remove makeup and go in with this on dry skin, then add a few drops of water on my fingers after working it in about 30 seconds dry. I use in the morning also and apply it on my dry skin and leave it as a mask for a few minutes in effort to benefit form the niacinamide and ceramides in it, then rinse. It leaves my skin soft but also feeling cleansed, without any squeakyness, dry tightness, or dullness often accompanied by cleansers. I have noticed that this helps maintains my skin barrier well since my skin isn't red or pink after cleansing. I would absolutely recommend this for every skin, especially acne prone since there are no real clogging ingredients in this apart from the Tocopherol which is not only last on the list, but is getting rinsed off. Prefer this over my Glossier Milky Jelly!
faceoff_positive.headline: Truly gentle for the skin barrier with luxury texture

faceoff_negative.comments: Did some research before picking up this item at my local Ulta, only to find out that it makes my face feel really hot when it touches the skin, and even hotter when I run it under water to rinse it off. I'm not sure which ingredient in the bottle is causing the burning sensation, so I would only recommend it to those who know for sure that none of the ingredients on the label will irritate them, because it really did a great job of cleansing my skin and making it feel comfortable after drying. I just can't get past the burning feeling during washing every single time.
faceoff_negative.headline: Makes face burn.
